name: Joe Wilmoth
body:
> "A ship in port is safe; but that is not what ships are built for. Sail out to sea and do new things." -Admiral Grace Hopper

### About 
I'm Joe. It's quite simple. I want to be on a team that shares the same passions as myself. A team that believes in humans working together and creating awesome ideas that people can use. I don't believe in Zombies. I like pizza; Even before software development.

### Contact
* **Twitter**: [@techsmut](http://www.twitter.com/techsmut)
* **Coder Wall**: [coderwall](https://coderwall.com/jbwilmoth)

### Programming
```ruby
  def skills {
      :programming_languages  => [Ruby],
      :development_frameworks => [Sinatra, Rails],
      :database               => [MySQL, postgreSQL, sqlite3],
      :testing                => [RSpec, Shoulda, Cucumber, Capybara],    
      :orms                   => [ActiveRecord],
      :front_end              => [Javascript, HTML, CSS],
      :version_control        => [Git],
      :app_servers            => [Thin, Unicorn]
    }
  end
```
